title: New Citibank survey points to small business optimism.
summary: Raj Seshadri, Head of Small Business Banking at Citibank, spoke with CNBC about the results of a new Citibank survey showing clear signs of an improving outlook among U.S. small businesses. "What we see in the survey is there's a pivotal point where they're moving from survival mode into growth mode," she said.
